mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reports AS R JOIN users AS U ON R.dclr_user_no = U.user_no JOIN report_reasons AS RR ON R.dclr_rsn_cd = RR.dclr_rsn_cd

SELECT R.dclr_id, R.dclr_trgt_type_cd, R.prcs_stts_cd, R.dclr_rcpt_dt, U.user_ncnm AS dclrUserNickname, U.user_lgn_id AS dclrUserLoginId, RR.dclr_rsn_cn AS dclrReasonContent, COALESCE(R.dclr_trgt_user_no, R.dclr_trgt_conts_id) AS intelligentTargetInfo FROM reports AS R JOIN users AS U ON R.dclr_user_no = U.user_no JOIN report_reasons AS RR ON R.dclr_rsn_cd = RR.dclr_rsn_cd
ORDER BY R.dclr_rcpt_dt DESC LIMIT #{pagination.recordSize} OFFSET #{pagination.limitStart}

SELECT r.dclr_id, r.dclr_user_no, dclr_user.user_ncnm AS dclr_user_ncnm, dclr_user.user_lgn_id AS dclr_user_lgn_id, r.dclr_trgt_user_no, trgt_user.user_ncnm AS dclr_trgt_user_ncnm, r.dclr_rsn_cd, rr.dclr_rsn_cn, r.dtl_dclr_rsn_cn AS dclr_cn, DATE_FORMAT(r.dclr_rcpt_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS dclr_dt, r.prcs_stts_cd, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report_attachments WHERE dclr_id = r.dclr_id) AS attachment_count, r.prcs_pic_mngr_no, r.dclr_prcs_rslt_cn, r.dclr_trgt_type_cd, r.dclr_trgt_conts_id, r.prcs_cmptn_dt FROM reports AS r LEFT JOIN users AS dclr_user ON r.dclr_user_no = dclr_user.user_no LEFT JOIN users AS trgt_user ON r.dclr_trgt_user_no = trgt_user.user_no LEFT JOIN report_reasons AS rr ON r.dclr_rsn_cd = rr.dclr_rsn_cd WHERE r.dclr_id = #{dclrId}

SELECT rh.hstry_id, rh.dclr_id, rh.user_no, rh.actn_cn, rh.prcs_dsctn_memo_cn, rh.action_type, DATE_FORMAT(rh.prcs_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS prcs_dt, u.user_ncnm AS prcsUserNcnm FROM report_history rh JOIN users u ON rh.user_no = u.user_no WHERE rh.dclr_id = #{dclrId} ORDER BY rh.prcs_dt DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE reports SET prcs_stts_cd = #{newStatus}, prcs_pic_mngr_no = #{adminId}, dclr_prcs_rslt_cn = #{dclrPrcsRsltCn}, prcs_cmptn_dt = NOW() WHERE dclr_id = #{dclrId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report_history ( hstry_id, dclr_id, user_no, actn_cn, prcs_dsctn_memo_cn, bfr_stts_cd, crnt_stts_cd, prcs_dt, action_type ) VALUES ( #{hstryId}, #{dclrId}, #{adminId}, #{actnCn}, #{prcsDsctnMemoCn}, 'RECEIVED', #{newStatus}, NOW(), #{sanctionType} )
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('HSTRY_', LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(hstry_id, 7) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 5, '0')) FROM report_history
SELECT dclr_trgt_user_no FROM reports WHERE dclr_id = #{dclrId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_sanctions (sanction_id, user_no, dclr_id, sanction_type, sanction_reason, sanction_start_dt, sanction_end_dt, prcs_admin_no) VALUES ( #{sanctionId}, #{userNo}, #{dclrId}, #{sanctionType}, #{sanctionReason}, #{sanctionStartDt}, #{sanctionEndDt}, #{prcsAdminNo} );
mapper.select: SELECT sanction_id, user_no, dclr_id, sanction_type, sanction_reason, sanction_start_dt, sanction_end_dt, prcs_dt, prcs_admin_no FROM user_sanctions WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY prcs_dt DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT CONCAT('SANCT_', LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(sanction_id, 7) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 5, '0')) FROM user_sanctions
